text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Summer camp—it's the season for many<n>
inexperienced racers to make leaps and<n>bounds in
their development.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ¡¿C-campamento de verano?! Esto es malo, Entrenador.<n>¡Muy malo!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Well... summer camp is, like, peak<n>awkward
situation time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Like going swimming together in your<n>bathing
suits, sharing a bottle of<n>ramune, wearing yukata
and watching<n>fireworks...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
And then, at the end, the two of them....<n>Gaaah!
However you put it, th-that's just<n>too much!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, sorry. I let my fantasies... I<n>mean, my
imagination, run wild.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I've just never experienced this kind of<n>thing
before. I've been focused on<n>nothing but sports
my whole life.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
And that's why I was imagining all the<n>different
possibilities... Aaahh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She can't stop fidgeting with worry. It's<n>like she
has a mistaken impression of<n>what summer camp
is...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
What if I meet someone? What am I<n>supposed to
do?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Coach me, Trainer! I don't know how to<n>hold a
conversation that isn't about<n>lifting and gettin'
ripped!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's a tall hurdle, but this might be a<n>good
opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Classic in spring was fierce. Now, I<n>want her
to enjoy a nice change of pace<n>during camp.
